Black Jack: Sora kara Kita Kodomo: An army plane defects from the U-ran (Uranium) Union and lands in Black Jack's garden carrying a family. Their purpose is to have their son, who is suffering from an incurable disease, treated by Black Jack. But it is beyond even BJ's ability to cure the disease.
[['Seya, Shinji', 'Director, Animation Director'], ['Chiba, Kouichi', 'Sound Director'], ['Tezuka, Osamu', 'Original Creator'], ['Kurahashi, Shizuo', 'Sound Effects']]
